question: Which of the following is the major difference between ‘Varna’ and ‘Jati’?
option1: Jatis are limited whereas Varnas are unlimited
option2: Jatis are only four whereas Varnas are many
option3: Varnas are only four whereas Jatis are many
option4: Jati is decided by birth but not Varna
answer: Varnas are only four whereas Jatis are many
explanation: Varna’s are only four in number i.e. Brahmin, Kshatriya, Vaishya and Sudra.  Castes or Jatis are very large in number. They also have many subdivisions known as sub-castes.
